lexUnit.name: fry.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: cook or be cooked in hot fat or oil

sentence.text: 4 Heat the remaining oil in the pan and gently fry the nut and tomato mixture for 2-3 minutes , stirring constantly .
Gently fry the banana pieces .
Heat the oil in a large pan and gently fry the onion and garlic for 5 minutes .
Heat two tablespoons of the oil in a large pan and gently fry the onion and garlic for about 5 minutes .
Elke has laid the table for the evening meal and fried the eggs .
She was frying eggs and bacon and mushrooms on a camp stove in Woolley 's billet .
Fry the potatoes and onion gently in the oil for about 20 minutes until softened .
Heat oil and fry onion until soft .
Fry the sliced onions in the remaining oil until golden brown .
Melt the butter in a large casserole and fry the onion and garlic for 5 minutes .
Heat the oil and fry the chicken for 10-15 minutes .
Fry the scampi briefly in a scrap of butter with a little chopped onion .
If you run out of room in the oven , fry the mushrooms in the butter for about 5 minutes , then add the other ingredients .
Fry the pork in the pan until well browned , then drain off any excess fat .
Heat the oil in a large casserole and fry the venison until will browned .
Fry the bacon until crisp .
Fry the bacon , crushed garlic and bread in oil until golden brown .
Meanwhile fry mushrooms , then add turkey and warm through .
Fry the potatoes , covered , for about 20 minutes on high , shaking the tightly covered pan frequently .
Heat the butter and oil in a large , heavy based frying pan , then fry the sausage , peppers and garlic for 5 minutes until softened .
In a large flameproof casserole , fry the chicken joints in the oil until golden brown .
Melt butter and fry lettuce slowly until soft .
Stir in the taco seasoning and fry for 1 minute to develop the flavour .
Add the courgettes and onion and fry gently for 4 minutes .
Add the breadcrumb mixture and fry until golden .
